Item desscription: The Dabia Shirt is handcrafted in Ghana from meticulously woven, organic cotton, ensuring authenticity and sustainability. Its medium-weight fabric offers versatility and durability for any occasion. For lasting quality, dry cleaning is recommended. A timeless blend of craftsmanship and eco-conscious design.

Our brand celebrates authentic craftsmanship and cultural heritage, offering meticulously woven, handmade garments crafted in Ghana. We use organic cotton, ensuring a perfect balance of comfort, durability, and sustainability. Designed for versatility and timeless elegance, our pieces reflect a commitment to quality, tradition, and eco-conscious fashion.
Size Options: Men's Waist Sizes: 28R, 28L, 30R, 30L, 32R, 32L, 34R, 34L, 36R, 36L, 38R, 38L. (R = Regular, L = Long)

This elegant skirt set blends sophistication with a modern edge. The asymmetric layered skirt creates a striking silhouette with its flowing design. Perfect for making a statement at any special occasion.

Elevate your look with this dreamy maxi dress. Featuring a flowy silhouette, a corset-style midsection, and delicate cording details, the perfect blend of elegance and charm. She is ideal for any occasion where effortless style is key.
Nessa is a flawless fit that not only compliments but celebrates the body. Boasting a sophisticated high neckline and elegantly elongated sleeves, it exudes refined grace.

Blossom is a captivating maxi sun dress with a mesmerizing pattern. Featuring a beautiful ruffled design from shoulder to bust and a soft rushed detail at the bottom, it exudes effortless summer charm.

This off-shoulder dress is ruched to perfection and hugs the body in all the right places. The lower part features daring cutouts, creating a cascading design that adds movement and flair to every step.
Sunny is a fun design that features a crop top that steals the spotlight with its bold ruffled design. I can be paired perfectly with an A-cut beautiful skirt adorned with flap designs at the front.

A baby sis to the Kaia dress the Mimosa is a mini-dress that blends elegance and allure flawlessly. With a snatched bodice and a graceful flare from the waist, it accentuates every curve. The plunging neckline and delicate shoulder straps add a touch of femininity.

A baby sis to the Kaia dress the Mimosa is a mini-dress that blends elegance and allure flawlessly. With a snatched bodice and a graceful flare from the waist, it accentuates every curve. The plunging neckline and delicate shoulder straps add a touch of femininity.

The Tropical Maxi is vibrant flowy maxi sun dress radiating with color and charm. Its thin, elegant shoulder sleeves complement the low-cut back design, showcasing a hint of allure. It is completed with a matching scarf.

Jasmin is an elegant maxi dress, designed to accentuate your curves with grace. Featuring minimal shoulder sleeves, a fitting bust, and an alluring knot detail at the back, it exudes timeless sophistication.
Lexi is our beautiful floral maxi dress and is designed for comfort and style. With a plunging back, it offers effortless elegance. The loose, free-flowing silhouette ensures comfort and sexiness.
Zainab is chic two-piece ensemble with a matching scarf. The top features a loose-fitted silhouette and a flattering V-neck, paired with flowing pants for an ethereal vibe.

Citrus is a striking two-piece ensemble â€“ where sophistication meets boldness. The top showcases dramatic puffed sleeves and a cinched lower part, while the high-waisted skirt boasts dynamic gathers at the front.
